column1: Uchi////Uchi has ruined all other sushi restaurants for my boyfriend and I!!! We loved everything about it and we tried nearly everything! The bill was a bit crazy but for that kind of quality
column3: service and execution it was worth every penny! The grilled edmame was to die for! It sounds so simple and uneventful but it was very delicious and unexpected. So Good!! Â We've had sushi all over the US and nothing tops Uchi.
